div.p: The Library Panel menu enables you to control what is displayed in the block library.

dlentry.dd: Creates thumbnail images for any items in the block library that are missing preview images.
Opens the Settings dialog box enabling you to set the Library directory path (COMPONENTSPATH variable).
Displays content from the BricsCAD BIM Library. This content is only available with a BricsCAD BIM or BricsCAD Ultimate license.
Displays content from the BricsCAD Mechanical Library. This content is only available with a BricsCAD Mechanical or Ultimate license.
Displays content from the Bricsys 2D Library.
Displays content from the User Library. This is user-created content.
